1: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    2: %%% @doc
    3: %%% Comprehensive Authorization Test Suite for ErlMCP
    4: %%%
    5: %%% This test suite validates the Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system
    6: %%% and authorization mechanisms implemented in erlmcp_auth.
    7: %%%
    8: %%% Test Categories:
    9: %%% 1. RBAC Tests - Role-based permissions
   10: %%% 2. Permission Tests - Granular permission checks
   11: %%% 3. Resource-Level Authorization - URI-based access control
   12: %%% 4. Tool Authorization - Tool execution permissions
   13: %%% 5. Session Authorization - Session management rights
   14: %%%
   15: %%% Testing Methodology: Chicago School TDD
   16: %%% - Tests use REAL erlmcp processes, not mocks
   17: %%% - State-based verification (check observable state)
   18: %%% - Real gen_server operations for auth system
   19: %%% - No mock objects or stubs
   20: %%%
   21: %%% @end
   22: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: -module(erlmcp_authorization_SUITE).
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %%%====================================================================
   29: %%% Common Test Callbacks
   30: %%%====================================================================
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [
   34:      %% RBAC Tests
   35:      admin_role_full_access_test,
   36:      user_role_limited_access_test,
   37:      guest_role_read_only_access_test,
   38:      role_escalation_prevention_test,
   39: 
   40:      %% Permission Tests
   41:      resource_access_permissions_test,
   42:      tool_execution_permissions_test,
   43:      prompt_template_permissions_test,
   44:      administrative_operation_permissions_test,
   45: 
   46:      %% Resource-Level Authorization
   47:      resource_uri_access_control_test,
   48:      resource_subscription_authorization_test,
   49:      resource_update_permissions_test,
   50: 
   51:      %% Tool Authorization
   52:      tool_call_authorization_test,
   53:      tool_parameter_validation_test,
   54:      dangerous_tool_restrictions_test,
   55: 
   56:      %% Session Authorization
   57:      session_creation_permissions_test,
   58:      session_termination_rights_test,
   59:      cross_session_access_prevention_test,
   60: 
   61:      %% Edge Cases
   62:      invalid_permission_denied_test,
   63:      expired_session_authorization_test,
   64:      concurrent_permission_changes_test
   65:     ].
   66: 
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     ct:pal("Starting ErlMCP Authorization Test Suite"),
   69: 
   70:     %% Start required applications
   71:     application:ensure_all_started(crypto),
   72:     application:ensure_all_started(ssl),
   73:     application:ensure_all_started(gproc),
   74:     application:ensure_all_started(jsx),
   75: 
   76:     %% Start erlmcp_core application
   77:     case application:start(erlmcp_core) of
   78:         ok -> ok;
   79:         {error, {already_started, erlmcp_core}} -> ok
   80:     end,
   81: 
   82:     %% Start auth server for testing
   83:     {ok, AuthPid} = erlmcp_auth:start_link(#{
   84:         rate_limiter_enabled => false,
   85:         api_keys => #{
   86:             <<"test_admin_key">> => <<"user_admin">>,
   87:             <<"test_user_key">> => <<"user_regular">>,
   88:             <<"test_guest_key">> => <<"user_guest">>
   89:         }
   90:     }),
   91: 
   92:     ct:pal("Auth server started: ~p", [AuthPid]),
   93: 
   94:     [{auth_pid, AuthPid} | Config].
   95: 
   96: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   97:     ct:pal("Ending ErlMCP Authorization Test Suite"),
   98: 
   99:     %% Stop auth server
  100:     AuthPid = proplists:get_value(auth_pid, Config),
  101:     case is_process_alive(AuthPid) of
  102:         true -> erlmcp_auth:stop();
  103:         false -> ok
  104:     end,
  105: 
  106:     %% Stop application
  107:     application:stop(erlmcp_core),
  108: 
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  112:     %% Reset auth state before each test
  113:     case whereis(erlmcp_auth) of
  114:         undefined -> ok;
  115:         _ -> erlmcp_auth:stop()
  116:     end,
  117: 
  118:     {ok, _AuthPid} = erlmcp_auth:start_link(#{
  119:         rate_limiter_enabled => false,
  120:         api_keys => #{
  121:             <<"test_admin_key">> => <<"user_admin">>,
  122:             <<"test_user_key">> => <<"user_regular">>,
  123:             <<"test_guest_key">> => <<"user_guest">>
  124:         }
  125:     }),
  126: 
  127:     %% Configure default permissions
  128:     setup_default_permissions(),
  129: 
  130:     %% Create test sessions
  131:     AdminSession = create_test_session(<<"user_admin">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  132:     UserSession = create_test_session(<<"user_regular">>, [<<"user">>]),
  133:     GuestSession = create_test_session(<<"user_guest">>, [<<"guest">>]),
  134: 
  135:     [
  136:         {admin_session, AdminSession},
  137:         {user_session, UserSession},
  138:         {guest_session, GuestSession}
  139:         | Config
  140:     ].
  141: 
  142: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  143:     %% Cleanup test sessions
  144:     AdminSession = proplists:get_value(admin_session, Config, undefined),
  145:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config, undefined),
  146:     GuestSession = proplists:get_value(guest_session, Config, undefined),
  147: 
  148:     lists:foreach(fun(SessionId) ->
  149:         case SessionId of
  150:             undefined -> ok;
  151:             _ -> erlmcp_auth:destroy_session(SessionId)
  152:         end
  153:     end, [AdminSession, UserSession, GuestSession]),
  154: 
  155:     %% Stop auth server
  156:     erlmcp_auth:stop(),
  157: 
  158:     ok.
  159: 
  160: %%%====================================================================
  161: %%% RBAC Tests
  162: %%%====================================================================
  163: 
  164: %% @doc Test that admin role has full access to all resources
  165: admin_role_full_access_test(Config) ->
  166:     ct:pal("Testing admin role full access"),
  167: 
  168:     AdminSession = proplists:get_value(admin_session, Config),
  169: 
  170:     %% Admin should have all permissions on admin_resource
  171:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"admin_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  172:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"admin_resource">>, <<"write">>)),
  173:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"admin_resource">>, <<"execute">>)),
  174:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"admin_resource">>, <<"delete">>)),
  175: 
  176:     %% Verify admin has admin role
  177:     {ok, AdminRoles} = erlmcp_auth:get_user_roles(<<"user_admin">>),
  178:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"admin">>, AdminRoles)),
  179: 
  180:     %% Verify admin role has all permissions
  181:     {ok, AdminPerms} = erlmcp_auth:get_role_permissions(<<"admin">>),
  182:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"read">>, AdminPerms)),
  183:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"write">>, AdminPerms)),
  184:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"execute">>, AdminPerms)),
  185:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"delete">>, AdminPerms)),
  186: 
  187:     ct:pal("Admin role full access test passed").
  188: 
  189: %% @doc Test that user role has limited access (read, write only)
  190: user_role_limited_access_test(Config) ->
  191:     ct:pal("Testing user role limited access"),
  192: 
  193:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config),
  194: 
  195:     %% User should have read and write access
  196:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"user_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  197:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"user_resource">>, <<"write">>)),
  198: 
  199:     %% User should NOT have execute or delete access
  200:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"user_resource">>, <<"execute">>)),
  201:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"user_resource">>, <<"delete">>)),
  202: 
  203:     %% Verify user has user role
  204:     {ok, UserRoles} = erlmcp_auth:get_user_roles(<<"user_regular">>),
  205:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"user">>, UserRoles)),
  206:     ?assertNot(lists:member(<<"admin">>, UserRoles)),
  207: 
  208:     %% Verify user role has limited permissions
  209:     {ok, UserPerms} = erlmcp_auth:get_role_permissions(<<"user">>),
  210:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"read">>, UserPerms)),
  211:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"write">>, UserPerms)),
  212:     ?assertNot(lists:member(<<"execute">>, UserPerms)),
  213:     ?assertNot(lists:member(<<"delete">>, UserPerms)),
  214: 
  215:     ct:pal("User role limited access test passed").
  216: 
  217: %% @doc Test that guest role has read-only access
  218: guest_role_read_only_access_test(Config) ->
  219:     ct:pal("Testing guest role read-only access"),
  220: 
  221:     GuestSession = proplists:get_value(guest_session, Config),
  222: 
  223:     %% Guest should have read access
  224:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"public_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  225: 
  226:     %% Guest should NOT have write, execute, or delete access
  227:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"public_resource">>, <<"write">>)),
  228:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"public_resource">>, <<"execute">>)),
  229:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"public_resource">>, <<"delete">>)),
  230: 
  231:     %% Verify guest has guest role
  232:     {ok, GuestRoles} = erlmcp_auth:get_user_roles(<<"user_guest">>),
  233:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"guest">>, GuestRoles)),
  234: 
  235:     %% Verify guest role has read-only permission
  236:     {ok, GuestPerms} = erlmcp_auth:get_role_permissions(<<"guest">>),
  237:     ?assertEqual([<<"read">>], GuestPerms),
  238: 
  239:     ct:pal("Guest role read-only access test passed").
  240: 
  241: %% @doc Test that role escalation is prevented
  242: role_escalation_prevention_test(Config) ->
  243:     ct:pal("Testing role escalation prevention"),
  244: 
  245:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config),
  246: 
  247:     %% User cannot add admin role to themselves (would need admin API)
  248:     %% This tests the permission check for role management
  249:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"admin_management">>, <<"write">>)),
  250: 
  251:     %% Verify user still only has user role
  252:     {ok, UserRoles} = erlmcp_auth:get_user_roles(<<"user_regular">>),
  253:     ?assertNot(lists:member(<<"admin">>, UserRoles)),
  254:     ?assert(lists:member(<<"user">>, UserRoles)),
  255: 
  256:     %% Verify user still cannot access admin resources
  257:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"admin_resource">>, <<"delete">>)),
  258: 
  259:     ct:pal("Role escalation prevention test passed").
  260:

  265: %% @doc Test resource access permissions
  266: resource_access_permissions_test(Config) ->
  267:     ct:pal("Testing resource access permissions"),
  268: 
  269:     AdminSession = proplists:get_value(admin_session, Config),
  270:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config),
  271:     GuestSession = proplists:get_value(guest_session, Config),
  272: 
  273:     %% Setup resource permissions
  274:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"resource_1">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>, <<"guest">>]),
  275:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"resource_1">>, <<"write">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>]),
  276:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"resource_2">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>]),  % Admin-only
  277: 
  278:     %% Test resource_1 read access
  279:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"resource_1">>, <<"read">>)),
  280:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"resource_1">>, <<"read">>)),
  281:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"resource_1">>, <<"read">>)),
  282: 
  283:     %% Test resource_1 write access
  284:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"resource_1">>, <<"write">>)),
  285:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"resource_1">>, <<"write">>)),
  286:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"resource_1">>, <<"write">>)),
  287: 
  288:     %% Test resource_2 admin-only access
  289:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"resource_2">>, <<"read">>)),
  290:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"resource_2">>, <<"read">>)),
  291:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"resource_2">>, <<"read">>)),
  292: 
  293:     ct:pal("Resource access permissions test passed").
  294:

  389: %% @doc Test resource URI access control
  390: resource_uri_access_control_test(Config) ->
  391:     ct:pal("Testing resource URI access control"),
  392: 
  393:     AdminSession = proplists:get_value(admin_session, Config),
  394:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config),
  395:     GuestSession = proplists:get_value(guest_session, Config),
  396: 
  397:     %% Setup URI-based permissions
  398:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"file://public/data.txt">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>, <<"guest">>]),
  399:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"file://private/data.txt">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>]),
  400:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  401:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"write">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  402: 
  403:     %% Test public URI access
  404:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"file://public/data.txt">>, <<"read">>)),
  405:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"file://public/data.txt">>, <<"read">>)),
  406:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"file://public/data.txt">>, <<"read">>)),
  407: 
  408:     %% Test private URI access
  409:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"file://private/data.txt">>, <<"read">>)),
  410:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"file://private/data.txt">>, <<"read">>)),
  411:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"file://private/data.txt">>, <<"read">>)),
  412: 
  413:     %% Test admin URI read access
  414:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"read">>)),
  415:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"read">>)),
  416:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"read">>)),
  417: 
  418:     %% Test admin URI write access
  419:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"write">>)),
  420:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"write">>)),
  421:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"file://admin/config.json">>, <<"write">>)),
  422: 
  423:     ct:pal("Resource URI access control test passed").

  425: %% @doc Test resource subscription authorization
  426: resource_subscription_authorization_test(Config) ->
  427:     ct:pal("Testing resource subscription authorization"),
  428: 
  429:     AdminSession = proplists:get_value(admin_session, Config),
  430:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config),
  431:     GuestSession = proplists:get_value(guest_session, Config),
  432: 
  433:     %% Setup subscription permissions (using execute for subscribe)
  434:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"resource_events">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>]),
  435:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"resource_events">>, <<"execute">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>]),
  436:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"admin_events">>, <<"execute">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  437: 
  438:     %% Test public resource subscription
  439:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"resource_events">>, <<"execute">>)),
  440:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"resource_events">>, <<"execute">>)),
  441:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(GuestSession, <<"resource_events">>, <<"execute">>)),
  442: 
  443:     %% Test admin resource subscription
  444:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"admin_events">>, <<"execute">>)),
  445:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"admin_events">>, <<"execute">>)),

  583: %% @doc Test session creation permissions
  584: session_creation_permissions_test(Config) ->
  585:     ct:pal("Testing session creation permissions"),
  586: 
  587:     %% All authenticated users should be able to create sessions
  588:     {ok, AdminSession} = erlmcp_auth:create_session(<<"user_admin">>, #{test => admin}),
  589:     {ok, UserSession} = erlmcp_auth:create_session(<<"user_regular">>, #{test => user}),
  590:     {ok, GuestSession} = erlmcp_auth:create_session(<<"user_guest">>, #{test => guest}),
  591: 
  592:     %% Verify sessions were created
  593:     ?assert(is_binary(AdminSession)),
  594:     ?assert(is_binary(UserSession)),
  595:     ?assert(is_binary(GuestSession)),
  596: 
  597:     %% Verify sessions are different
  598:     ?assertNotEqual(AdminSession, UserSession),
  599:     ?assertNotEqual(UserSession, GuestSession),
  600: 
  601:     %% Cleanup
  602:     erlmcp_auth:destroy_session(AdminSession),
  603:     erlmcp_auth:destroy_session(UserSession),
  604:     erlmcp_auth:destroy_session(GuestSession),
  605: 
  606:     ct:pal("Session creation permissions test passed").

  626: %% @doc Test cross-session access prevention
  627: cross_session_access_prevention_test(Config) ->
  628:     ct:pal("Testing cross-session access prevention"),
  629: 
  630:     AdminSession = proplists:get_value(admin_session, Config),
  631:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config),
  632: 
  633:     %% Create user-specific resources
  634:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"user_admin_data">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  635:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"user_regular_data">>, <<"read">>, [<<"user">>]),
  636: 
  637:     %% User cannot access admin-specific resources (unless shared)
  638:     %% Admin cannot access user-specific resources (unless shared)
  639:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"user_regular_data">>, <<"read">>)),
  640:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"user_admin_data">>, <<"read">>)),
  641: 
  642:     %% But admin can access their own resources
  643:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"user_admin_data">>, <<"read">>)),
  644:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"user_regular_data">>, <<"read">>)),
  645: 
  646:     ct:pal("Cross-session access prevention test passed").

  689: %% @doc Test concurrent permission changes
  690: concurrent_permission_changes_test(Config) ->
  691:     ct:pal("Testing concurrent permission changes"),
  692: 
  693:     AdminSession = proplists:get_value(admin_session, Config),
  694:     UserSession = proplists:get_value(user_session, Config),
  695: 
  696:     %% Setup initial permissions
  697:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  698:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"write">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  699: 
  700:     %% Verify initial state
  701:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  702:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  703: 
  704:     %% Add user permission
  705:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>, [<<"user">>]),
  706: 
  707:     %% Verify permission change took effect
  708:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  709: 
  710:     %% Remove user permission
  711:     ok = erlmcp_auth:remove_permission(<<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>, [<<"user">>]),
  712: 
  713:     %% Verify permission removal took effect
  714:     ?assertEqual({error, forbidden}, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(UserSession, <<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  715: 
  716:     %% Admin still has access
  717:     ?assertEqual(ok, erlmcp_auth:check_permission(AdminSession, <<"concurrent_resource">>, <<"read">>)),
  718: 
  719:     ct:pal("Concurrent permission changes test passed").

  726: setup_default_permissions() ->
  727:     %% Admin permissions - full access
  728:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"admin_resource">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  729:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"admin_resource">>, <<"write">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  730:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"admin_resource">>, <<"execute">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  731:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"admin_resource">>, <<"delete">>, [<<"admin">>]),
  732: 
  733:     %% User permissions - read and write
  734:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"user_resource">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>]),
  735:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"user_resource">>, <<"write">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>]),
  736: 
  737:     %% Guest permissions - read only
  738:     ok = erlmcp_auth:add_permission(<<"public_resource">>, <<"read">>, [<<"admin">>, <<"user">>, <<"guest">>]),
  739: 
  740:     ok.

  751:         test => true,
